img_above_text:
![Wukong Turtle 16.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/9/9c/Wukong_Turtle_16.jpg)
Quickly dodge to the side, and keep your distance as the embedded spear will explode after a short moment, sending rocks up all around it.
img_below_text:
The good news is this attack is so powerful it will leave her incredibly drained, and give you plenty of time to retaliate with all your saved up focus points, a Spirit Attack, and anything else you can throw at her!
![Wukong Turtle 18.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/7/70/Wukong_Turtle_18.jpg)
summary_promot:

Quickly dodge to the side, and keep your distance as the embedded spear will explode after a short moment, sending rocks up all around it."
        - Following Text: "The good news is this attack is so powerful it will leave her incredibly drained, and give you plenty of time to retaliate with all your saved up focus points, a Spirit Attack, and anything else you can throw at her!
![Wukong Turtle 18.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/7/70/Wukong_Turtle_18.jpg)"

        Your task:
        1. Generate a **short, clear, and informative English summary** of the image.
        2. Focus primarily on the **preceding and following text** to infer the image's **purpose, content, or narrative role**.
        3. Do **not** speculate beyond the visible content.
img_summary: The image depicts a snowy battlefield in *Black Myth: Wukong*, featuring the player character facing off against a boss named "Kang Jin Star." The boss, standing in the foreground with a glowing spear, is likely preparing or recovering from a powerful attack. The preceding text advises dodging to avoid an explosive spear attack, while the following text highlights an opportunity to counterattack after the boss is drained from their move. The scene emphasizes strategic timing and positioning during the fight.
